text: Argodrepana tenebra is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Wilkinson in 1967. It is found in New Guinea., 1970: A new species of Argodrepana and records of other white Drepanidae (Lepidoptera) from New Guinea. Pacific Insects 12 (2): 241-250. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1967 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of New Guinea
title: Argodrepana tenebra
